bibliography:
Anselm, St., Proslogion, in St. Anselm’s
Proslogion, M. Charlesworth (ed.), Oxford: OUP, 1965

University Center for Medieval Studies, translation by David
Burr].

Aquinas, T., Summa Theologica, 1272, literally translated
by Fathers of the English Dominican Province, London: Burn, Oates

 [Available online,

Burr].

London: Gollancz, 1948.

Koebner, 1884; translated as The Foundations of Arithmetic,

Original German text available online,
 (628 KB PDF file), maintained by Alain Blachair, Académie de
Nancy-Metz.

1965
